description: Try our easy to follow Banana & Strawberry Ice Cream recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Banana & Strawberry Ice Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Blend together the custard, cream, bananas, half the strawberries, and the maple syrup in a blender or food processor until smooth.
Pour the mixture into a freezer-proof container and freeze for 3 hours, until just starting to freeze around the edges.

Scrape the mixture into a bowl and beat with an immersion blender until smooth. Finely chop the remaining strawberries, stir into the mixture, and pour back into the freezer-proof container. Freeze for 3-4 hours or overnight until firm. Let soften for 15 minutes before serving.
